title: LoL game not working correctly, changing size and resolution at the start of each game. HELP PLEASE
body: After the released of the new patch a few days back, I tried logging into LoL and my game started acting up. It sets all of my graphic settings back to low, and sets my capped FPS back to 25 FPS. I have to redo all of these settings when I get in game and it gets really annoying. Someone help?

replies.body: It sounds like your settings are not syncing to the servers.  This can happen if you are running any third party applications or have modified your game files.  If this is the case for you, I recommend downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which will help provide a fresh reinstall and set you to a clean slate.  Hope that helps!
